traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Meloon wields {@item Azuredge|wdh} but can't attune to it, and thus gains none of its benefits.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Meloon can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Meloon can regain 20 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Meloon makes four attacks with Azuredge.

actions.name: Azuredge
entries: {@atk m} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5 damage) slashing damage.
